Thanks, it works on my Windows 7 x64. But without a proper README file, few people can figure out. You have to login using username "gg@gl.hf" with password "gg". In custom game, never click "Create game", right-click the map and select "create offline map".

@saio00 That is not enough to play SCII:HotS, especially since it sounds like your system uses regular RAM as graphics memory if you're running on integrated graphics, which I suspect you are with those low specs. 

Need a better computer dude. If you have a monitor, you can build a computer that will max SCII for $500.
